title: Creativity, engage!
author: Mac
content: Thought I’d post up a lovely video by fellow CIID classmate Helle Rohde. Shows a bit of a glimpse into the fast paced prototyping that we’ve been doing so much of lately. Enjoy!
excerpt: Thought I’d post up a lovely video by fellow CIID classmate [Helle Rohde][1]. Shows a bit of a glimpse into the fast paced prototyping that we’ve been doing so much of lately. Enjoy!
